title: My Life as a Holiday Album
description:
Come home for the holidays with this small-town, heartwarming story full of hidden secrets, true love, and the real meaning of family.
Turmoil might be prevalent in their personal lives, but that won’t stop Edie, Stephen, Ty, Eliza, Mayson, and Ginny from throwing their parents the biggest surprise 50th birthday party on New Year’s Eve. What they don’t realize is that the magic of family might just be the answer to the problems each of them face this season. This interconnected standalone twines the lives of six couples as they find their way to a happily ever after with the help of family and friends.“She was the bow to my present. The universe of stars to my small, round earth.”Inspired by Lady A's "All I Want for Christmas Is You,” this second-generation, wintery goodness is the last book in the My Life as an Album series.
author: L.J. Evans
